name: Ensure you use the right algorithm like AES-128
Ensure not using MD5/SHA1 hashes for cryptographic functions of NodeJs to avoid sensitive data being compromised
Ensure not using MD5/SHA1 hashes for cryptographic functions of NodeJs to avoid sensitive data being compromised
Ensure to use Optimal Asymmetric Encryption Padding(OAEP) scheme with RSA encryption to avoid sensitive information exposure.
Ensure to use at least 2048 bits key when using RSA encryption algorithm or use some advanced algorithm
Ensure not using deprecated cryptographic hash otherwise it could be broken by hackers (JEE)
Ensure that Hard-coded salt is not used with cryptography function so that sensitive data is protected
Ensure to not use "javax.crypto.NullCipher" for anything other than testing
Perefer using encryption providing sufficient key size to ensure enough entropy against attacks
